subject: Hockey, Ice
Movies
lead_paragraph: In a decision many view as a painful twist, the Johnstown Chiefs, inspired by the movie “Slap Shot,” are leaving Pennsylvania next season and moving to Greenville, S.C.
snippet: In a decision many view as a painful twist, the Johnstown Chiefs, inspired by the movie “Slap Shot,” are leaving Pennsylvania next season and moving to Greenville, S.C.
